Title: Windows & Intune: Enabling the Sustainable Enterprise of the Future | OD1319
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how Windows and Intune are enabling sustainable IT transformation. Learn how cloud-powered devices, intelligent management, and carbon-aware features help reduce emissions and improve efficiency. Backed by a recent WSP USA analyst report, this session offers data-driven insights and strategies to build a greener, smarter enterprise.
